item.title: GraphQL + SQLBoiler Generator
item.description: This note as a continuation of my journey with Go template. Based on the knowledge of what template package can do, we’ll generate a resolvers code from a given sqlboiler model struct to to satisfy graphql implementation of neelance/graphql-go.

item.title: Hello Hugo!
item.description:
Another experiment on how/where I write things I like to write (Duh).

***

So, I’ve been through the path of Wordpress, Tumblr, Ghost, and recently, Gitbook. Each has its own merits and drawbacks. However, I see something interesting from Hugo, that I didn’t see in my previous adventures with other writing tools.
